name: D. Good Substrings
statement:
You’ve got string , consisting of small English letters. Some of the
English letters are , the rest are .A substring () of string (where is
the length of string ) is string .The substring is , if among the
letters there are ones (look at the sample’s explanation to understand
it more clear).Your task is to find the number of distinct good
substrings of the given string . Two substrings and are considered
distinct if their content is different, i.e. .
